mapper.sql: carriersID, sendCompany, sendAddress, sendLinkMan, sendPhone, receiveCompany, fk_receiveAddress, receiveLinkMan, receivePhone, leaverDate, receiveDate, finishedState, insuranceCost, transportCost, otherCost, totalCost, remark, fk_userID, checkInTime, isDelete, alterTime
mapper.select: select count(*) from carriers ca , scheduling sc where ca.carriersID=sc.fk_carriersID and ca.finishedState=#{state}

select ca.*, sc.oilcost,sc.toll,sc.fine,sc.othercost as scothercost, (SELECT ((ca.insuranceCost+ca.transportCost+ca.otherCost)+(sc.oilcost+sc.toll+sc.fine+sc.othercost)) as `sum` from carriers ca , scheduling sc where ca.carriersid=sc.fk_carriersid and ca.finishedState=#{state}) as sctotalcost from carriers ca , scheduling sc where ca.carriersID=sc.fk_carriersID and ca.finishedState=#{state}
limit #{page},#{size}

select count(*) from carriers where finishedState=#{state}
and fk_userID=#{uid}
